definitions.definition: make fun of or attempt to provoke (a person or animal) in a playful way.
examples: Brenda teased her father about the powerboat that he bought but seldom used
synonyms: razz "Larry's dentist is the dork he used to tease in sixth grade"

definitions.definition: tempt (someone) sexually with no intention of satisfying the desire aroused.
gently pull or comb (something tangled, especially wool or hair) into separate strands.
examples: she was teasing out the curls into her usual hairstyle

definitions.definition: find something out from a mass of irrelevant information.
examples: a historian who tries to tease out the truth

definitions.definition: comb (hair) in the reverse direction of its natural growth in order to make it appear fuller.
comb (the surface of woven cloth) to raise a nap.
